message: beer revolution is really nice... i'm hoping to hang out there before the ylt shows at the fox
If not, you missed out big time on the densest beer party in Oakland.  Check it out http://www.beer-revolution.com/
oh man... i'll bet that was epic
@chrisdelbuck i thought that vegan soul food place was okay... i dunno, maybe i'm just too much of a carnivore to really get into it
One of my favorite things to do in Oakland is go to Beer Revolution on a lovely afternoon enjoy a fancy beer and eat Souley Vegan on the outdoor patio. /bliss
kinda wish they had a rosamunde next door
yeah, i'd probably give it another chance

@djchall For someone who isn't of the Vegan or Vegetarian persuasion I can understand, but for those of us who are its generally pretty awesome.  Highlight items: BBQ Tofu, Mac n Cheese, Potato Salad, Fried Okra, Southern Fried Tofu Burger, Black Eyed Peas... the Collards are hit or miss based on saltyness.
